alert.note: Alert for Northern San Joaquin Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued November 09 at 1:10PM PST until November 10 at 8:00AM PST by NWS Sacramento
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 9 AM PST THURSDAY... ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO 8 AM PST THURSDAY... * WHAT...For the Frost Advisory, temperatures as low as 35 will result in frost formation. For the Dense Fog Advisory, visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...Northern San Joaquin Valley County. * WHEN...For the Frost Advisory, from 2 AM to 9 AM PST Thursday. For the Dense Fog Advisory, from 4 AM to 8 AM PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Frost could kill sensitive outdoor vegetation if left uncovered. Make sure outdoor pets have shelter from the cold. Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. Be alert for sudden changes in visibility.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
